Preterit Intransitive.text: b-u=šəkəl-ano ʕAlo i=nuro šaġilo aʕle l-u=goran d-i=ḥaqsiziye d-səmle ʕal af=faqire, w ʕal am=məskine, w hul d-xaməd w mayəṯ b-i=dukto ʻso brannte das Feuer den ʕAlo, entsprechend dem Unrecht, das er an den Armen verübt hatte, bis er verkohlte und an Ort und Stelle starbʼ; RT 33;

Qṭile, be áydarbo qṭile, Xandaq xamido ‘He killed him, at the moment he killed him, Xandeq collapsed/crumbled into dust’ (NE_Boses and Shushan). Ilyas says that this verb is used typically to talk about thr fire, so here he imagines that something similar happened. He also approved yığılma as a possible turkish translation(13/05/24 Ilyas p.c.)
